        public static java.lang.String decToHex(int num1)

        desc:

        receives a number from 1 to 15 which will be transformed into its hexadeciamal equivalent

        Returns:
        this net returns a character that represents the corresponding hexadecimal value of the number
        Throws:
        DifferentNummber - if the number received is different from the range 1 to 15 this exception is executed

      • hexToDec

        public static int hexToDec(java.lang.String hex)

        desc:

        Resive a string in hexadecimal format, This method allows you to convert the received string into a decimal integer transforming all characters into integers using the hexadeciaml format equality to transform all letters into integers

        Returns:
        this method returns the hexadeciaml number received in its corresponding decimal number  
        Throws:
        SinSimbolos - if the resividated chain has any symbol or character different from the letters from A to F and whole numbers this exception will be executed
